### Books

-   [Introduction to Linear Algebra](https://math.mit.edu/~gs/linearalgebra/ila6/indexila6.html)
-   [Introduction to Probability for Computing](https://www.cs.cmu.edu/~harchol/Probability/book.html)
-   [Algorithms](https://algs4.cs.princeton.edu)
-   [Numerical Recipes: The Art of Scientific Computing](https://numerical.recipes/book.html)
-   [Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/people/cmbishop/prml-book/)

-   [The Algorithmic Foundations of Differential Privacy](https://www.cis.upenn.edu/~aaroth/Papers/privacybook.pdf)
-   [The Complexity of Differential Privacy](https://scholar.harvard.edu/files/salil/files/manuscript_2017.pdf)
-   [Introduction to Modern Cryptography](https://www.cs.umd.edu/~jkatz/imc.html)
-   [Effective Python](https://effectivepython.com)
